content: Which former U.S. president appeared on the television show "Laugh-In" before being elected to office?

That's a great question! I think the former U.S. president who appeared on "Laugh-In" before being elected is Richard Nixon. He made an appearance on the show in 1968, just before the presidential election that year. It was kind of a surprising move for a politician at that time to be on a comedy show like that. But Nixon went on to win the election and become the 37th President of the United States. So, maybe appearing on "Laugh-In" helped him connect with a younger audience or something like that. It's interesting how politics and entertainment can sometimes overlap.
